references.paper_title: Phi-3 Technical Report: A Highly Capable Language Model Locally on Your Phone
references.reason: This paper introduces Phi-3, a foundational vision-language model used in several methods evaluated in the main study.

references.paper_title: Qwen-VL: A Versatile Vision-Language Model for Understanding, Localization, Text Reading, and Beyond
references.reason: This paper introduces Qwen-VL, another vision-language model, relevant to the performance comparison of different multi-modal approaches.

references.paper_title: PaliGemma: A versatile 3B VLM for transfer
references.reason: This paper introduces PaliGemma, a vision-language model, which is directly used in the ColPali method, a key method benchmarked in the study.

references.paper_title: Dense Passage Retrieval for Open-Domain Question Answering
references.reason: This paper introduces DPR, a core text retrieval method that is adapted and compared with other methods in the dual-task settings.

references.paper_title: ColBERT: Efficient and Effective Passage Search via Contextualized Late Interaction over BERT
references.reason: This paper introduces ColBERT, another core text retrieval method, whose performance is benchmarked and compared with the DPR and other visual methods.
